page.title: 08Population East: FINTRY
page.content:
24 Adults (3 pensioners) 10 children. About half the families have children.
This is a sparsely peopled area, even by our standards. It's higher up and more rugged, but many still associate themselves with Fintry. One such, away at grid ref. 715.874 has run the Sunday School for many years.
Strung out along the B818 Denny road are 3 farming families and one more near the B822 Lennoxtown road.
The family at Loch Walton supervises the fishing, while another maintains the pumping station for the Carron Reservoir.
The remaining four households have no special local connections.
